channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' season 10: When the finale is, how to watch tonight
item.description: ABC's "Bachelor in Paradise" is nearing its end, with viewers wondering who's in it for love and who just wants to take off with the new cash prize.

item.title: 'Love Island USA' season 7 reunion next week: Here's when, how to watch
item.description: Just got a text! Your favorite"Love Island USA" contestants from this summerwill be reuniting next week.

item.title: Florida takes top 5 'most fun states' placement for a third year in a row
item.description: Florida is fun! The Sunshine State boasts plenty of opportunities for leisure and entertainment, with several huge theme parks that attract crowds year-round and more than 820 miles of sandy beach to lounge on. After all, Florida is home to "the most magical place on earth": Disney World.

item.title: Venice High lineman wins Big 15 football fan poll
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune unveiled its The Big 15 list of the Sarasota-Manatee counties' top college football recruits entering the 2025 high school football season. To see the full listCLICK HERE

item.title: HS ROUNDUP: Mustangs golf teams finish high in John Ryan Invitational
item.description: A roundup of high school sports contests played the week of Aug. 18-23, 2025, in Manatee and Sarasota counties.

item.title: 2025 Class 7A-8 Football Previews: Riverview, Sarasota, Venice
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune will get you ready for the 2025 high school football season. Here are previews for the teams competing in FHSAA District 7A-8.

item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Your guide to the 2025 Sarasota, Manatee high school…
item.description: From preseason practices through the state championship games, theHerald-Tribunewill be covering the high school football season every step of the way.

item.title: Vote for best 2025 high school football team in Manatee…
item.description: High school football teams are getting ready to take the field for the first time in the 2025 season on Friday, Aug. 15.

item.title: Sarasota must put limits on downtown parties, special eventsDavid Lough Guest columnist
item.description: The city of Sarasota is developing a new special event ordinance – a local law that regulates public events such as festivals, celebrations and block parties held on city streets, sidewalks and other public areas (including parks).

item.title: Sen. Jim Boyd is next in line for Florida Senate President role

item.title: New women's clothing store opens at UTC
item.description: The Mall at University Town Center recently announced the opening of Garage, a casual clothing store for young women who “embrace fun, confidence, and effortless style.”
